title: Can i get now PBE account?
body:
I want to ask if i can have it now 
If i can pls how?
someone tell me "if you playing lol 2 or more years" " riot will give you pbe acc

replies.body: At the moment, signups for PBE are closed. We're working on making the whole process a little smoother for you guys, and you can check up on the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates!

Hello Franta,

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq

This should help answer any questions you have!
